name: Smithy
_source: s;Luther;It seems like it was recently used.
s;Luther;Maybe these "Wandering Knights" used the forge?
s;Simon;Have you heard of these knights before?
s;Luther;I've heard of a similar group.
s;Luther;After many noble houses in the East fell, the houses' former knights banded together.
s;Luther;The knights who survived seem to be patrolling the lands, trying to restore order.
s;Simon;Well, if they're interested in restoring order, they may be willing to ally themselves with us.
s;Simon;It seems like the knights left some forging materials.
s;Luther;Well, if they're not using it...
